title: Katherine Grainger on 2012 rowing glory and mental mottos
description:
Britain's most decorated female Olympian, Katherine Grainger, chats to Bridgestone ambassador Daley Thompson about her rowing career, why she never uses the word 'sacrifice' and how she chases her dream, no matter what.

Daley is joining the podcast as co-host for special series of four episodes. One athlete from each decade, the 80s, 90s, 2000s, and 2010s.

The Olympic Channel Podcast is brought to you by Bridgestone - Worldwide Olympic and Paralympic partner.

Head to olympicchannel.com/podcast for more information.
